data.name: MAGICAL ANGEL FAIRY HEART Demo
data.detailed_description:
**This is the demo version.

A horde of unknown monsters appeared in the city.
FAIRY HEART is on a sortie to save the city.



★ Use a variety of skills to subdue your enemies.
If you fail the mission, you can see the HCG animation.

★ Key
C: Jump


Z: Attack


Z Hit ↑ : Jump Attack


Space Bar: Special Attack


Grab + C + Z: German Suplex


Grab +↓↓+ Z: Special Attack


X: Dot Laser Beam Attack

★note: Be Sure to Test Play In the Trial Version

data.short_description: All characters in this game are over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 1G
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 3G
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
warning!!
This is adult-only content that contains sexual content.
Sexual content in this game includes sexual assault/sex without consent, sex with zombies, etc.
If you are looking for an ordinary game, this is not the game for you.
All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
